meanings.definition: A member of a congress, especially a member of the US House of Representatives or the Senate.
meanings.sent1: The congresspersons gathered to discuss new laws.
meanings.sent2: Many congresspersons attended the important meeting in Washington.
meanings.sent3: The congresspersons had a race to see who could pass the most bills.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of politics, congresspersons are the lighthouses guiding the ship.
meanings.sent5: The word 'congresspersons' brings to mind dedicated individuals shaping our laws.

meanings.sent1: We need to invite all the congresspersons to the event.
meanings.sent2: The congresspersons' opinions varied on the proposed bill.
meanings.sent3: The congresspersons decided to wear matching hats for fun.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the chatter of congresspersons.
meanings.sent5: The term 'congresspersons' echoes through the halls of government.
